article_text:
TOKYO—A court ruled Wednesday that Kansai Electric Power Co. can't restart two of its reactors due to safety concerns, dealing a setback to Prime Minister Shinzo Abe's efforts to jump-start Japan's idled nuclear power plants.

The ruling marks the first time since the Fukushima nuclear crisis erupted in March 2011 that a court has ordered a power supplier not to bring a nuclear plant online.

The Fukui District Court...

twitter.title: Japan Court Blocks Reactor Restarts
